list_definition.definition: a list sent with goods giving details of price and quantity

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Don’t forget to send an invoice for the goods.
They invoiced us for the cost of the shipment.

list_ex_of_english: Many of the invoices are, of course, tax-inclusive from unregistered wholesalers, and so the purchase tax is not known.
Information on the number of individual purchase orders and firms to which these invoices related is not available except at disproportionate cost.
No central record is kept of late payment of individual invoices.
The proposed changes would allow payment on invoices under $25,000 prior to verification of receipt and acceptance of the items purchased.
Firstly, all equipment should be bought and owned by specific members of the band, and all purchase invoices should be kept.
The errors occurred because poor controls existed in the review and processing of invoices for payment.
As long as oil does not get on the brains of the computer, it is possible to put one in a workshop to deliver invoices.
Four surveys have been carried out, covering all invoices paid during specific periods.
